Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
07.04.2011 SH SCR16335 Removed BDH406 CapitalSmall conversion
10.09.2009 AS SCR#14811 aqdded new parameter pi.surpress_DHSH
01.04.2009 SH SCR14267 Added some DCLN variables as parameter for module
to search the debtor
20.11.2007 SH SCR13139 Extended argument list for "BDC200_2 SearchDebtor"
14.09.2007 AK SCR12923 skip the update of DCLN if GSET_YESNO(229) = N
16.02.2007 AK SCR12205 open the task 'Loop table DCLN' in modify mode
16.02.2007 AK SCR12205 fixed bug in convert DCLN name/addres with BDH406
08.02.2007 AK SCR12205 Remove disabling convert DCLN name/addres with BDH406
25.01.2007 AK SCR12205 temporary disable convert DCLN name/addres with BDH406
16.01.2007 AK SCR12205 convert DCLN name and addres values with BDH406
29.12.2005 SH SCR9891 Removed v.DEBC_NO from argument list for task "Open transaction"
21.09.2005 EE SCR8983 fixed bug with start match
02.09.2005 SH SCR8983 Added new parameter po.DEBC_NO, only relevant if BDC200
is called as synchron job (for the moment only BSP103A uses this parameter)
28.07.2004 SH SCR6095 Chaged some comments in program
26.11.2003 SH SCR4876 Added additional trigger v.DEBC_RowExists, if FALSE the
- current progarm stops immediately. (see SCR for details)
08.10.2003 SH SCR4301 Added new argument v.DCLN_HADR_COUNTRY for program
- 'BDC200_2 Search DEBH in DHSH'
19.08.2003 SH SCR4128 Added program BDC200_04 which deletes reserved
- searchwords from the extracted serachwords, done by BDC200_01
23.06.2003.SH SCR3749 Added SORT to "Loop table DCLN"
19.03.2003 SH SCR3172 Moved program calls (STEP 2) from current task to task
- "Open transaction", so that the handling of one DCLN row will be handled in one transaction
12.06.2002 JJ Changed pars to alpha for job submission
30.04.2002 SH Add new parameter 'pi.DCLN_RUNNUMBER'
... uses only in BSP103A, which call BDC200 as synchron job
-- Counter how many rows are in table DCLN for the unique combination
-- of DCLN_ADMNO, DCLN_CLNTNO, DCLN_MATCHPERFORMED
-- USED for the END TASK CONDITION
-- actual DCLN_NO
-- If FALSE BDC200 stops immediately, will be update in task "Loop tabel DCLN"
... check and transfer alpha pars to numerics
-- How many matching rows are in table DCLN?
-- NEED FOR END TASK CONDITION
-- STEP 1:
-- Loop over all rows of table DCLN, with the unique combination
-- DCLN_ADMNO, DCLN_CLNTNO, DCLN_MATCHPERFORMED
-- STEP 2: --> Test if the debtor already exist in Heller database
-- Set v.DCLN_NO + 1 to get the next DCLN_NO

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM :1 WHERE DCLN_ADMNO=:2 and DCLN_CLNTNO=:3 and DCLN_RUNNUMBER=:4 and DCLN_MATCHPERFORMED = 'N'

Text.val: -- Get next matching row with the unique combination
-- of DCLN_ADMNO, DCLN_CLNTNO, DCLN_MATCHPERFORMED
-- STEP 2: --> Test if the debtor already exist in Heller database
